articles.title: Twitter's New CEO Parag Agrawal Joins Club Of India-Born US Tech Captains - NDTV
articles.description: Twitter Inc on Monday became the latest Silicon Valley titan to appoint an Indian-born chief executive officer, joining the likes of Microsoft and Google in recognizing the Asian country as one of the world's richest pools of tech talent.
articles.content:
Jack Dorsey endorsed Parag Agrawal's technical capabilities as "transformational". (FILE)
